name: Solum Nights
description:
You are called by a mysterious person to exorcise spirits in at forest late a night but is that all there is?
Play a game with customized pixel art while fighting different types of monsters trying to survive and exorcise the evil that resides within the forest.
Combo System - The gameplay is further enchanted by the combo system - use skills in combinations to gain other benefits, helping you in combat in various ways.
No grinding - The game is easily beaten without fighting a lot of battles,you will need a party member though.

It is recommended that you first play on Easy Mode.
You can also you LMB - Confirm / RMB - Cancel
